item.title: martin-john-hadley
item.description: Martin John Hadley I'm a reproducible research evangelist and data science consultant with over 6 years of experience working in both industry and academia. My tools of choice at present are R and Shiny, read more about my experience on my LinkedIn profile or download a copy of my CV. You can find all my published works on my ORCID account (orcid.org/0000-0002-3039-6849) You can find my open source projects and contributions on my GitHub profile github.
